subs.text: JavaScript question. Why can't we have the require verb work in browser apps as it does in Node. It would take a URL as a param. It would be so much simpler if I could use exactly the same modules in both places, with no fuss, no new software to install.

I just got three vaccines: Shingles, pneumonia and the second Covid booster. I usually don't get negative reactions to vaccines, but with three in my system at the same time, who knows. Wish me luck! :smile:
Ken Hall is keeping a Drummer blog and asks about archiving.
